name: XmlFileUpdateTask
description: Update an attribute in an Xml file based on XPath filter
author: Black Marble

inputs.name: xpath
inputs.label: Xpath query
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Xpath query to select a node e.g: /configuration/appSettings/add[@key='A variable']

inputs.name: attribute
inputs.label: Attribute
inputs.helpMarkDown: The attribute name to update e.g. value (if not set InnerText of node will be updated)

inputs.name: value
inputs.label: Value
inputs.helpMarkDown: The new value to set e.g. 'new value'

inputs.name: recurse
inputs.label: Recurse
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true will search for files recursivally, default is true.
